title: Conference Matchup Previews, Bus-Gate, and Week 11 Bets | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We recap the Seahawks-Cardinals 'Thursday Night Football' game that resulted in the Seahawks taking control of their division (2:00). Then we preview Week 11 matchups: Raiders-Chiefs, Rams-Bucks, Ravens-Titans, Steelers-Jaguars, and Washington-Steelers (20:20), before discussing what we're betting (1:11:00).
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
